title: ECE 3rd sem
content:
I had a few questions regarding ECE (3rd sem)

  
1)What are the difficult subjects in ECE 3rd sem and how should we go about preparing for them

2)What is generally the cutoff for MRD for 3rd sem ECE students

3)Can we approach Professors for TA from 3rd sem itself,and generally what is the CGPA they look for   


Thank you!

comments.body: also would appreciate if someone could answer this with EC campus in context

Hey, I am from RR Campus, although I have asked a friend of mine from EC Campus regarding this.  


But for RR Campus,   
a. Difficult subjects in 3rd sem would be **Analog Circuit Design**, **Mathematics for Electronics Engineers.** 

b. I didn't get what you mean by cutoff for MRD??

c. You can, but usually teachers announce you (students) about it only by 4th sem. FYI, This question has been answered in the FAQ already
